context.p: As soon as the technical services for the Shell integration exist in , you can define and publish marketable services based on them. Your cost calculation for the services should include any external costs for operating virtual systems.

step.cmd: Log in to the administration portal with your service manager account.
Define one or more marketable services based on the technical services you created for the Shell.
Define price models for your marketable services.
Publish the services to a marketplace.

taskbody.result: For details on these steps, refer to the Supplier's Guide and to the online help of .
